name: Neutron Star (Lethian)
description:
Neutron Star

Protect your "Neutron Star" from the attack of enemy spaceships. Use keys A, B, X and P appearing on the screen (in any order) to shoot enemies down - those keys are limited to the Jam's requirements and may be challenging at first play, but the game is relatively short.

Controls:
A B X P - Attack enemies
Space bar - Continue

Game made for Mini Jam #74
https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-74-chaos

Source code available on GitHub:
https://github.com/lethiandev/neutron-star

Music by Aim To Head - Artemis
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a4SLh0xvJeg

Thanks for playing!
